structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 165, Sec. 32 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] All reports required to be made by permanent state departments, officers and commissions may, subject to the approval of the secretary and except as otherwise provided, be printed annually or otherwise published in electronic form.
